      • plot

        public static void plot(java.lang.String title,
                        TransformPolar.ComplexTransform transform,
                        Transform2D.Domain rDomain,
                        Transform2D.Domain thetaDomain,
                        Transform2D.Domain colorDomain)
        plot a complex function using polar domain coordinates. r is plotted as the inner domain
        Parameters:
        title - the title for the chart frame
        transform - the complex function to be mapped
        rDomain - the domain of the 'r' (origin distance) parameter
        thetaDomain - the domain of the 'theta' parameter
        colorDomain - the domain of color values

        plot a complex function using polar domain coordinates. theta is plotted as the inner domain
        Parameters:
        title - the title for the chart frame
        transform - the complex function to be mapped
        rDomain - the domain of the 'r' (origin distance) parameter
        thetaDomain - the domain of the 'theta' parameter
        colorDomain - the domain of color values
